DOC.brief_summary: Participants ( N = 300 ) randomly assign : 1 ) equipment-only comparison group receive smartphone activity monitor wristband receive smartphone intervention prompt , 2 ) intervention group receive activity monitor wristband work conjunction smartphone reduce sedentary time via smartphone prompt prolong sedentary bout . All participant provide Fitbit® wristband activity monitor Android smartphone day week ( i.e. , Mondays ) . Participants complete 1-week baseline accelerometer EMA period prior start intervention . Participants follow 26 week intervention begin follow-up visit 6 , 13 , 26 week . The primary outcome accelerometer-measured time spent sedentary activity . Sedentary break , total active time , time spent light , moderate , vigorous activity additionally evaluate outcome . Contextual variables potential treatment mechanism assess via traditional questionnaire measurement daily random EMAs baseline follow-up visit . Brief smartphone-based daily diary assessment complete daily duration study .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Smartphone Intervention Reduce Sedentary Behavior
DOC.criteria: A score ≥ 4 REALMSF85 indicate > 6th grade English literacy level , must least 18 year age A BMI ≥ 25 ( overweight/obese ) , meet current physical activity guideline measure 7Day Physical Activity Recall Do contraindication physical activity base Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) Able attend study visit , posse valid home address function telephone number . Participants physical disability restrict low limb function and/or read skill 7th grade read level .
